Nhiếp ảnh chân dung.name: lý quỳnh
Nhiếp ảnh chân dung.prompt: Restore an old photo with high fidelity. Maintain the original facial features, outlines, and fine details of the subject. Remove scratches, stains, and fading, while preserving natural texture and authenticity. Enhance clarity and sharpness without altering the person’s identity.
